definitions: The act of moving something or someone from one place to another.
The act of conveying ownership or rights from one person or entity to another.
The act of changing from one job, department, or location to another within the same organization.
The act of transmitting data or information from one medium or device to another.
examples: She is transferring the files to the new server.
They are transferring ownership of the property.
He is transferring to the London office next month.
The system is transferring funds between accounts.
